item.title: By: Barbara

item.description: You did a beautiful job with the challah! I'd love to try this whole wheat version.

item.title: By: Jeanne

item.description: Beautiful flowers and gorgeous challah bread! I made the same recipe and we really enjoyed it too.
item.content:encoded: Beautiful flowers and gorgeous challah bread! I made the same recipe and we really enjoyed it too.
